content.p: At Nottingham University Business School, our unique tri-campus offering provides students with a truly immersive global education that transforms aspiring business leaders into visionaries and change-makers of the future. We are proud to be among an elite group of 'triple crown' accredited business schools globally. Explore our UK, Malaysia, and China campuses. Renowned for our excellence in teaching, research, and thought leadership, we educate and influence people from across the world to become leaders in sustainable business and management. You will learn from experts in their field, work with leading business practitioners, and benefit from world-leading research. Our dynamic and supportive community enables our students to excel in a global environment and gain a head-start in their chosen career. Top 100 Business Masters QS World Business Masters Rankings 2025 AACSB, EQUIS, AMBA and Small Business Charter accredited UN PRME Champion Full list of accreditations
